node.title: The greatest love of my life is:
node.author: apl

data.field: my Significant Other the celebrity I'm stalking a former teacher a current teacher my mastery of Perl-fu my programming chops in general my capacity for caffeine my capacity for alcohol the Jets some other sports team a book a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massively_multiplayer_online_game|MMPOG] residing in a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massively_multiplayer_online_game|MMPOG] my Wii or Kinect my iPad or iPhone or iBook Love? I don't go into [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pon_farr|Pon farr] for another 4 years! my pet (don't look at me like that!) [http://www.iloveny.com/|New York] [http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0063115/|Alice B. Toklas] [wp://the cable guy] the pizza guy Me. Of course I love myself most ([http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Narcissism|Narcissism], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Narcissistic_personality_disorder|NPD]) [http://www.lyricsondemand.com/onehitwonders/whatislovelyrics.html|What is love?] other
